io_raw_de:
• Inputs: 2× MIC/LINE combo (XLR/6.3mm)
• Input 2: HI‑Z switch (Gitarre/Bass)
• Outputs: 2× LINE OUT L/R (6.3mm, impedance balanced)
• PHONES (stereo)
• MIDI In/Out (5‑pin DIN)
• USB 2.0 to computer/iPad
• 5V DC in (Micro‑USB‑B)
controls_raw_de:
Input 1 Gain
• Input 2 Gain
• HI‑Z switch (Input 2)
• +48V Phantom
• MIX (Input↔DAW)
• OUTPUT (Line Out)
• PHONES level
power_raw_de:
USB 2.0 bus‑powered oder 5V DC (Micro‑USB‑B)
• Power requirements: 2.5 W
• 5V DC: 4.8–5.2 V, ≥0.5 A
notes_raw_de:
2× Class‑A D‑PRE mic preamps
• Direct monitoring (MIX knob)
• Loopback function
• MIDI I/O
Quelle: https://download.steinberg.net/downloads_hardware/UR22mkII/UR22mkII_documentation/ur22mkII_en_om_a0.pdf ; https://download.steinberg.net/downloads_hardware/UR22mkII/UR22mkII_documentation/ur22mkII_en_gs_a0.pdf ; https://www.steinberg.net/audio-interfaces/ur22c-recording-pack/ur22mkii/
